annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Importing specific items instead of using wildcard imports improves code readability and maintainability.
label: best_practice
reason: Importing specific items instead of using wildcard imports improves code readability and maintainability.

annotation: ⚠️ SAST Risk (Low): Wildcard imports can lead to namespace collisions and make it unclear which names are present in the module.
label: sast_risk
reason: Wildcard imports can lead to namespace collisions and make it unclear which names are present in the module.

annotation: 🧠 ML Signal: Modifying __all__ dynamically can indicate a pattern of re-exporting symbols from submodules.
label: ml_signal
reason: Modifying __all__ dynamically can indicate a pattern of re-exporting symbols from submodules.
